QuestData.Title: They Will Pay With Blood
QuestData.Description:
The tauren go too far. I did not escape their outpost for fear that they would attack the cave and slaughter my people.
It looks like they planned to do it all along. Slay some of the Feltotem. Thin the herd.
QuestData.CompletionText: These tauren have always been bloodthirsty. The Highmountain chieftain has barely been able to stop them killing all of us.
QuestData.RewardText: Their numbers are fewer, but still they threaten our safety.
